english.segment1: [Verse 1:]. Search my heart. And search my soul. There is nothing else. That I want more
english.segment2: [Verse 2:]. Shine Your light. And show Your face. In my life. Lord have Your way
english.segment3: [Verse 3:]. Hear my cry. And hear my prayer. Draw me close. I know your near
english.segment4: [Verse 4:]. Give me strength. And give me grace. To walk with You. Lord, all my days
english.segment5: [Chorus 1:]. So with all my heart and all my soul. With all I am, Lord, I will follow You
english.segment6: [Chorus 2:]. You took the cross, You took my shame. Restored my life, now I live to worship You
english.segment7: [Bridge:]. Without You I am nothing. Without You I am nothing. Without You I am nothing
